title: I won my promo game, but I did not get promoted
body: I just won my promo game and it did not promote me.  What gives?

replies.body: Looking into this for you, I see you are in a miniseries and have indeed won a game.  It's necessary to win 2 out of 3 games to receive your promotion.  You'll have to win one more, per our[ ranked play ](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204010760-Ranked-Play-FAQ)guide.  Good luck!
